snippets:
[
    // Note: ${GREEK} is not used anymore.
    // Note: te|tex|ex|ten, ddot/dddot/cdot are highly confusing.
	// Note: \pmb stands for "Poor man's bold". I do not want to support it. \mathfrak is used less often and is not supported.
    
    // Fixed: fix ddot -> \dot{d} and several other bugs. Fixed by giving two ways of writing \d{1,4}ot.
	// Fixed: fix rdot. [Done]
	// Fixed: Delete ${SYMBOL}. [Done]
    // Fixed: add mathbf back [Done]
    // Fixed: AddSubscript, correctly handle cos1 [Done]
    // Fixed: SumProd [Done]
	// Fixed: should ${OPERABLE} contain \partial? Current treatment contains it. [Done]
	// Fixed: Derivatives [Done]
    // Fixed: ~~ and ~~~ conflict
    // Fixed: mbb and similar combinations are triggered in text mode!!! Because I used regular expressions?? We should enclose RegEx in parentheses. [Done]
    // Fixed: Add \odot [Done]

    
    // test: dot ddot dddot ddddot dddddot ddddddot cdot adot addot adddot addddot adddddot dd. ddd. dddd. ddddd.
	// test: arcsin sin arcsinh sinh arcsina sina arcsinha sinha arcsin1 sin1 arcsinh1 sinh1

	// Math mode
	{trigger: "mk", replacement: "$$0$", options: "tA"},
	{trigger: "dm", replacement: "$$\n$0\n$$", options: "tAw"},
	{trigger: "beg", replacement: "\\begin{$0}\n$1\n\\end{$0}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "initm", replacement: "$\\DeclareMathOperator{\\sech}{sech} \\DeclareMathOperator{\\csch}{csch} \\DeclareMathOperator{\\arcsec}{arcsec} \\DeclareMathOperator{\\arccot}{arccot} \\DeclareMathOperator{\\arccsc}{arccsc} \\DeclareMathOperator{\\arccosh}{arccosh} \\DeclareMathOperator{\\arcsinh}{arcsinh} \\DeclareMathOperator{\\arctanh}{arctanh} \\DeclareMathOperator{\\arcsech}{arcsech} \\DeclareMathOperator{\\arccsch}{arccsch} \\DeclareMathOperator{\\arccoth}{arccoth}$", options: "tA"}, // Initialize math mode
	{trigger: "decl", replacement: "\\DeclareMathOperator{\\${0:op}}{${1:op}}", options: "mA"}, // Declare math operator

    // Greeks
	{trigger: "@a", replacement: "α", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "alpha", replacement: "α", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@b", replacement: "β", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "bet", replacement: "β", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "βa", replacement: "β", options: "mA"}, // for accidentally typing "beta"
	{trigger: "@c", replacement: "χ", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "chi", replacement: "χ", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@g", replacement: "γ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "gamma", replacement: "γ", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@G", replacement: "Γ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "Gamma", replacement: "Γ", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@d", replacement: "δ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "∇ta", replacement: "δ", options: "mA"}, // for accidentally typing "delta"
	{trigger: "@D", replacement: "Δ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "Delta", replacement: "Δ", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@e", replacement: "ϵ", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "eps", replacement: "ϵ", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: ":e", replacement: "ε", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "vep", replacement: "ε", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@z", replacement: "ζ", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "zet", replacement: "ζ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ζa", replacement: "ζ", options: "mA"}, // for accidentally typing "zeta"
	{trigger: "thet", replacement: "θ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "Thet", replacement: "Θ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "θa", replacement: "θ", options: "mA"}, // for accidentally typing "theta"
    {trigger: "Θa", replacement: "Θ", options: "mA"}, // for accidentally typing "Theta"
    {trigger: "eta", replacement: "η", options: "mA"}, // Note that this is not compatible with zeta and t/Theta
    {trigger: "@i", replacement: "ι", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "iota", replacement: "ι", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@t", replacement: "τ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "tau", replacement: "τ", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@k", replacement: "κ", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "kappa", replacement: "κ", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@l", replacement: "λ", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@L", replacement: "Λ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "lambda", replacement: "λ", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "Lambda", replacement: "Λ", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@m", replacement: "μ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "mu", replacement: "μ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@n", replacement: "ν", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "nu", replacement: "ν", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "phi", replacement: "ϕ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "Phi", replacement: "Φ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "psi", replacement: "ψ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "Psi", replacement: "Ψ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "vfi", replacement: "φ", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@r", replacement: "ρ", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "rho", replacement: "ρ", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@s", replacement: "σ", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@S", replacement: "Σ", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "sigma", replacement: "σ", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "Sigma", replacement: "Σ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ome", replacement: "ω", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ωga", replacement: "ω", options: "mA"}, // for accidentally typing "omega"
    {trigger: "Ome", replacement: "Ω", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "Ωga", replacement: "Ω", options: "mA"}, // for accidentally typing "Omega"
	{trigger: "@o", replacement: "ω", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "@O", replacement: "Ω", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@p", replacement: "π", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "pi", replacement: "π", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@P", replacement: "Π", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "Pi", replacement: "Π", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "xi", replacement: "ξ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@x", replacement: "ξ", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "Xi", replacement: "Ξ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@X", replacement: "Ξ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "varp", replacement: "ϖ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ϖi", replacement: "ϖ", options: "mA"}, // for accidentally typing "varpi"
    {trigger: "ups", replacement: "υ", options: "mA"}, // upsilon
    {trigger: "varka", replacement: "ϰ", options: "mA"}, // varkappa
    {trigger: "digam", replacement: "ϝ", options: "mA"}, // digamma
    {trigger: "varrh", replacement: "ϱ", options: "mA"}, // varrho
    {trigger: "ϱo", replacement: "ϱ", options: "mA"}, // for accidentally typing "varrho"
    {trigger: "varsig", replacement: "ς", options: "mA"}, // varsigma
    {trigger: "varth", replacement: "ϑ", options: "mA"}, // vartheta
    {trigger: "varTh", replacement: "ϴ", options: "mA"}, // varTheta
	{trigger: ":p", replacement: "∂", options: "mA"}, // partial
	{trigger: "part", replacement: "∂", options: "mA"}, // partial
	{trigger: ":d", replacement: "\\mathrm{d}", options: "mA"}, // differential
	{trigger: "dif", replacement: "\\mathrm{d}", options: "mA"}, // differential

	// Symbols
	{trigger: "(ln|log|det|exp)", replacement: "{\\[[0]] $0} $1", options: "rmA", description: "Add backslash before symbols"}, // Get away with ${SYMBOL}

	{trigger: "ooo", replacement: "∞", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "sum", replacement: "{\\sum_{${0:i=1}}^{${1:n}}$2\\,}$3", options: "mA"}, // Seems to work. Not using Unicode to avoid the need for manually using \limits. Tag: SumProd
	{trigger: "prod", replacement: "{\\prod_{${0:i=1}}^{${1:n}}$2\\,}$3", options: "mA"}, //Tag: SumProd
	{trigger: "lim", replacement: "\\lim_{ ${0:n} → ${1:\\infty} } $2", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "pm", replacement: "±", options: "m"}, // \pm, \plusminus
	{trigger: "mp", replacement: "∓", options: "m"}, // \mp, \minusplus
	{trigger: "+-", replacement: "±", options: "mA"}, // \pm, \plusminus
	{trigger: "-+", replacement: "∓", options: "mA"}, // \mp, \minusplus
	{trigger: "...", replacement: "…", options: "mA"}, // \dots
	{trigger: "<->", replacement: "↔", options: "mA"}, // \leftrightarrow
	{trigger: "->", replacement: "→", options: "mA"}, // \to
	{trigger: "(!>|mapsto)", replacement: "↦", options: "rmA"}, // \mapsto
	{trigger: "inv", replacement: "^{-1}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "\\\\\\", replacement: "∖", options: "mA"}, // \setminus
	{trigger: "||", replacement: "∣", options: "mA"}, // \mid
	{trigger: "and", replacement: "∩", options: "mA"}, // \cap
	{trigger: "orr", replacement: "∪", options: "mA"}, // \cup
	{trigger: "inn", replacement: "∈", options: "mA"}, // \in
    {trigger: "(sst|subset)", replacement: "⊂", options: "rmA"}, // \subset
	{trigger: "(sse|⊂eq)", replacement: "⊆", options: "rmA"}, // \subseteq
	{trigger: "set", replacement: "\\{ $0 \\}$1", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "(=>|implies)", replacement: "⟹", options: "rmA"}, // \implies
	{trigger: "(=<|impliedby)", replacement: "⟸", options: "rmA"}, // \impliedby
	{trigger: "iff", replacement: "⟺", options: "mA"}, // \iff
	{trigger: "ex", replacement: "∃", options: "mA"}, // \exists
    {trigger: "(fa|forall)", replacement: "∀", options: "rmA"}, // \forall
	{trigger: "(===|equiv)", replacement: "≡", options: "rmA"}, // \equiv
	{trigger: "(Sq|square)", replacement: "□", options: "rmA"}, // \square
	{trigger: "!=", replacement: "≠", options: "mA"}, // \neq
	{trigger: ">=", replacement: "≥", options: "mA"}, // \geq
	{trigger: "<=", replacement: "≤", options: "mA"}, // \leq
	{trigger: ">>", replacement: "≫", options: "mA"}, // \gg
	{trigger: "<<", replacement: "≪", options: "mA"}, // \ll
	{trigger: "(~~|sim)", replacement: "∼", options: "rmA"}, // \sim
	{trigger: "(∼~|approx)", replacement: "≈", options: "rmA"}, // \approx. Note that the first tilde is \sim, which is indistinguishable with the keyboard symbol "~" in many cases!
	{trigger: "prop", replacement: "∝", options: "mA"}, // \propto
	{trigger: "nabl", replacement: "∇", options: "mA"}, // \nabla, \del 
	{trigger: "del", replacement: "∇", options: "mA"}, // \del, \nabla
	{trigger: "xx", replacement: "×", options: "mA"}, // \times
	{trigger: "**", replacement: "⋅", options: "mA"}, // \cdot
	{trigger: "cd.", replacement: "⋅", options: "mA"}, // cdot, this treatment is similar to "dd." and "ddd." in order to avoid confusion with "cdot" and "ddot", in which case the "xdot" will be parsed as "\dot{x}".
    {trigger: "(o\\+|oplus)", replacement: "⊕", options: "rmA"},
	{trigger: "(ox|otimes)", replacement: "⊗", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "od.", replacement: "⊙", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "para", replacement: "∥", options: "mA"}, // \parallel
    {trigger: "perp", replacement: "⟂", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "(land|wedge)", replacement: "∧", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "(lor|vee)", replacement: "∨", options: "rmA"},

	// {trigger: "xnn", replacement: "x_{n}", options: "mA"},
	// {trigger: "xii", replacement: "x_{i}", options: "mA"},
	// {trigger: "xjj", replacement: "x_{j}", options: "mA"},
	// {trigger: "xp1", replacement: "x_{n+1}", options: "mA"},
	// {trigger: "ynn", replacement: "y_{n}", options: "mA"},
	// {trigger: "yii", replacement: "y_{i}", options: "mA"},
	// {trigger: "yjj", replacement: "y_{j}", options: "mA"},


	{trigger: "ell", replacement: "ℓ", options: "mA"}, // \ell
	// {trigger: "lll", replacement: "\\ell", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "LL", replacement: "\\mathcal{L}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "HH", replacement: "\\mathcal{H}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "CC", replacement: "\\mathbb{C}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "RR", replacement: "\\mathbb{R}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "ZZ", replacement: "\\mathbb{Z}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "NN", replacement: "\\mathbb{N}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "II", replacement: "\\mathbb{1}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "\\mathbb{1}I", replacement: "\\hat{\\mathbb{1}}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "AA", replacement: "\\mathcal{A}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "BB", replacement: "\\mathbf{B}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "EE", replacement: "\\mathbf{E}", options: "mA"},

	// Unit vectors
	{trigger: ":i", replacement: "\\mathbf{i}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: ":j", replacement: "\\mathbf{j}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: ":k", replacement: "\\mathbf{k}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: ":x", replacement: "\\hat{\\mathbf{x}}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: ":y", replacement: "\\hat{\\mathbf{y}}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: ":z", replacement: "\\hat{\\mathbf{z}}", options: "mA"},


	// Operations on operables
	// The following two lines have different ways of dealing [a-z]?d{1,4}ot because we need to resolve the conflict.
    {trigger: "(${OPERABLE})(d{2,4}ot|hat|dot|bar|vec|tilde)", replacement: "\\[[1]]{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"}, // Tag: DDOT
	{trigger: "(d{2,4})\\.", replacement: "\\[[0]]ot{$0}$1", options: "rmA"}, // Tag: DDOT
    // {trigger: "(${OPERABLE})(d{2,4})\\.", replacement: "\\[[1]]ot{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"}, // Tag: DDOT. This line is put after the previous line to avoid conflict?
    {trigger: "(${OPERABLE})und", replacement: "\\underline{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "(${OPERABLE})ove", replacement: "\\overline{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "(${OPERABLE})bsm", replacement: "\\boldsymbol{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "(${OPERABLE})mbf", replacement: "\\mathbf{[[0]]}", options: "rmA"},


	// Standalone operations
	{trigger: "te", replacement: "\\text{$0}$1", options: "m"},
	{trigger: "tex", replacement: "\\text{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "(mbf|mathbf)", replacement: "\\mathbf{$0}$1", options: "rmA"}, // bold, non-italic
    {trigger: "(bsm|boldsymbol)", replacement: "\\boldsymbol{$0}$1", options: "rmA"}, // bold
    {trigger: "(mrm|mathrm)", replacement: "\\mathrm{$0}$1", options: "rmA"}, // non-italic
    {trigger: "(mca|mathcal)", replacement: "\\mathcal{$0}$1", options: "rmA"}, // calligraphic
	{trigger: "(msc|mathscr)", replacement: "\\mathscr{$0}$1", options: "rmA"}, // script
	{trigger: "(mbb|mathbb)", replacement: "\\mathbb{$0}$1", options: "rmA"}, // bubble? 
	{trigger: "(bar|hat|dot|vec|tilde)", replacement: "\\[[0]]{$0}$1", options: "rmA"},
	{trigger: "und", replacement: "\\underline{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ove", replacement: "\\overline{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "sr", replacement: "^{2}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "cb", replacement: "^{3}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "^", replacement: "^{$0}$1", options: "mA"}, // Used to be "rd"
    {trigger: "ten", replacement: "×10^{$0}$1", options: "mA"}, // Added by myself
	{trigger: "_", replacement: "_{$0}$1", options: "mA"}, // not using the {}_{} form in order to avoid {\sum}_{i=1}^{n}
	{trigger: "sq", replacement: "\\sqrt{ $0 }$1", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "//", replacement: "\\frac{$0}{$1}$2", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "ee", replacement: "e^{ $0 }$1", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "conj", replacement: "^{*}", options: "mA"}, // conjugate transpose
	{trigger: "trace", replacement: "\\mathrm{Tr}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "det", replacement: "\\det", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "Re", replacement: "\\mathrm{Re}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "Im", replacement: "\\mathrm{Im}", options: "mA"},

	// Auto subscript
	{trigger: "(${OPERABLE})(\\d)", replacement: "[[0]]_{[[1]]}", options: "rmA", description: "Auto letter subscript", priority: -1}, // why the priority?
	{trigger: "(${OPERABLE})_{(\\d)}(\\d)", replacement: "[[0]]_{[[1]][[2]]}", options: "rmA"},
	{trigger: "\\\\(hat|d{1,4}ot|bar|vec|tilde|underline|overline|boldsymbol|mathbf|mathrm|mathbb|mathcal|mathscr){(${OPERABLE})}(\\d)", replacement: "\\[[0]]{[[1]]}_{[[2]]}", options: "rmA"}, // Tag: DDOT, AddSubscript
	{trigger: "\\\\(hat|d{1,4}ot|bar|vec|tilde|underline|overline|boldsymbol|mathbf|mathrm|mathbb|mathcal|mathscr){(${OPERABLE})}_{(\\d)}(\\d)", replacement: "\\[[0]]{[[1]]}_{[[2]][[3]]}", options: "rmA"}, // TBA more; tag: AddSubscript

	// Trig functions
	{trigger: "(arcsin|arccos|arctan|arccot|arccsc|arcsec|sin|cos|tan|cot|csc|sec)", replacement: "\\[[0]]", options: "rmA"}, // There are no arc[cot|csc|sec] in Obsidian. To deal with that, type "initm". You can search "initm" in this file to see further information.
	{trigger: "\\\\(arcsin|arccos|arctan|arccot|arccsc|arcsec|sin|cos|tan|cot|csc|sec)([A-Za-gi-z0-9])", replacement: "\\[[0]] [[1]]", options: "rmA"}, // Insert space after trig funcs. Skips letter "h" to allow sinh, cosh, etc.
	{trigger: "\\\\(arcsinh|arccosh|arctanh|arccoth|arccsch|arcsech|sinh|cosh|tanh|coth|csch|sech)([A-Za-z0-9])", replacement: "\\[[0]] [[1]]", options: "rmA"}, // Insert space after trig funcs

	// Visual operations
    // [Deleted, check earlier versions in Cephalopod/testSnips/testfile*.txt]

	// Derivatives
	{trigger: "der", replacement: "\\frac{ \\mathrm{d}^{$0} ${1:y} }{ \\mathrm{d} ${2:x}^{$0} } $3", options: "mA"}, // derivative
	{trigger: "pdr", replacement: "\\frac{ ∂^{$0} ${1:f} }{ ∂ ${2:x}^{$0} } $3", options: "mA"}, // partial derivative
	{trigger: "pdd", replacement: "\\frac{ ∂^{2} ${0:f} }{ ∂ ${1:x} ∂ ${2:y}} $3", options: "mA"}, // mixed double partial derivative
	{trigger: "pdt", replacement: "\\frac{ ∂^{3} ${0:f} }{ ∂ ${1:x} ∂ ${2:y} ∂ ${3:z}} $4", options: "mA"}, // mixed triple partial derivative
	{trigger: "pdn", replacement: "\\frac{ ∂^{${0:n}} ${1:f} }{ ∂ ${2:x} ∂ ${3:y} … ∂ ${4:z}} $5", options: "mA"}, // mixed triple partial derivative

	// Integrals
	{trigger: "(iiint|iint|oint|int)", replacement: "\\[[0]]_{${0:0}}^{${1:\\infty}} $3 \\, \\mathrm{d}${2:x} $4", options: "rmA"},

	// Physics
	{trigger: "kbt", replacement: "k_{B}T", options: "mA"},

	// Quantum mechanics
	{trigger: "hba", replacement: "ħ", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "dag", replacement: "^{†}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "bra", replacement: "\\bra{$0} $1", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "ket", replacement: "\\ket{$0} $1", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "brk", replacement: "\\braket{ $0 | $1 } $2", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "\\\\bra{([^|]+)\\|", replacement: "\\braket{ [[0]] | $0 ", options: "rmA", description: "Convert bra into braket"},
	{trigger: "\\\\bra{(.+)}([^ ]+)>", replacement: "\\braket{ [[0]] | $0 ", options: "rmA", description: "Convert bra into braket (alternate)"},
	{trigger: "outp", replacement: "\\ket{${0:\\psi}} \\bra{${0:\\psi}} $1", options: "mA"},

	// Chemistry [Deleted, check earlier versions in Cephalopod/testSnips/testfile*.txt]

	// Environments
	{trigger: "pmat", replacement: "\\begin{pmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{pmatrix}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "bmat", replacement: "\\begin{bmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{bmatrix}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "Bmat", replacement: "\\begin{Bmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{Bmatrix}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "vmat", replacement: "\\begin{vmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{vmatrix}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "Vmat", replacement: "\\begin{Vmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{Vmatrix}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "case", replacement: "\\begin{cases}\n$0\n\\end{cases}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "bea", replacement: "\\begin{aligned}\n$0\n\\end{aligned}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "arr", replacement: "\\begin{array}\n$0\n\\end{array}", options: "mA"}, 
	{trigger: "matrix", replacement: "\\begin{matrix}\n$0\n\\end{matrix}", options: "mA"},

	// Brackets
	{trigger: "avg", replacement: "\\langle $0 \\rangle $1", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "norm", replacement: "\\lvert $0 \\rvert $1", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "(", replacement: "(${VISUAL})", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "[", replacement: "[${VISUAL}]", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "{", replacement: "{${VISUAL}}", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "(", replacement: "($0)$1", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "{", replacement: "{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "[", replacement: "[$0]$1", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "lr(", replacement: "\\left( $0 \\right) $1", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "lr|", replacement: "\\left| $0 \\right| $1", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "lr{", replacement: "\\left\\{ $0 \\right\\} $1", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "lr[", replacement: "\\left[ $0 \\right] $1", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "lr[a<]", replacement: "\\left< $0 \\right> $1", options: "rmA"},
	{trigger: "eval", replacement: "\\left. $0 \\right|_{ $1 } $2", options: "mA"}, // Evaluation of an expression
    {trigger: "tag", replacement: "\\tag{ $0 } ", options: "mA"},
	// Misc
	{trigger: "tayl", replacement: "${0:f}(${1:x} + ${2:h}) = ${0:f}(${1:x}) + ${0:f}'(${1:x})${2:h} + ${0:f}''(${1:x}) \\frac{${2:h}^{2}}{2!} + … $3", options: "mA"}, // Taylor series
]
matrixShortcutsEnvNames: pmatrix, cases, align, bmatrix, Bmatrix, vmatrix, Vmatrix, array, matrix
autoEnlargeBracketsTriggers: sum, int, frac, prod, bigcup, bigcap
